PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-14552004-11-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
ActRadiocommunication Act
PrecisEnactment of the RADIOCOMMUNICATION ACT (SUBSECTION 4(1) AND PARAGRAPH 9(1)(b)) EXEMPTION ORDER (SECURITY AND SAFETY, INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS), NO. 2004-1 - which exempts the RCMP from the application of the Act with respect to interfering with radiocommunication signals during President George W. Bush's visit to Canada in November 2004.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2004-0284 Publication Date: 2004-12-15
